Title: Masters of Evil
Director: Sebastian Montes, Ciro Nieli, Frank Paur
Writer: Jack Kirby (comic book), Joe Simon (comic book), Christopher Yost
Actors: Colleen O'Shaughnessey, Robin Atkin Downes, Chris Cox, James C. Mathis III
Plot: It's Hawkeye, Black Panther, and Ant Man to the rescue when Baron Zemo and his Masters of Evil defeat the rest of the team and take over the Avengers Mansion.
